title: Azure Monitoring & Workbooks
summary: Designed monitoring dashboards and workbooks for enterprise cloud ops.
description:
Developed end-to-end **monitoring systems** for Azure-based cloud environments using Workbooks, Alerts, and Azure Monitor for Hardis clients including **GL Events**, **Energizer**, **LNR**, and others.

- Created actionable dashboards for cost, usage, and failure detection
- Integrated alerting mechanisms across distributed cloud environments
- Trained clients on interpreting live monitoring data
